title: Iken Senki Völundio
original_name: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ
sinopse: Cleo is a mercenary looking to live a self-sufficient life, but the job that would have been his last was much more than he bargained for. While attempting to escape he runs across a strange demi-human named Amber, who for unknown reasons has made it her mission to protect him.
